messages.en: *Grunt*

messages.zh: 这家伙是个瘸的！先解决掉他！
messages.en: This guy leg is limp! Finish him off first!

messages.zh: 格拉尼！继续耗下去，我们全得交代在这儿了！
messages.en: Grani! We can’t keep this up for much longer! We’ll all go down if we stay here!
Even if you say it!
Quick! Take Carol and run!

messages.zh: 我受了伤，会拖慢你们的速度！
messages.en: My injury will only slow you down!

messages.zh: 之后我会找办法和你们会合的！走！
messages.en: I'll find a way to join you later! Go!

messages.zh: 说好了，记得要来拿你的那份！
messages.en: As agreed! Remember to come and get your share!
...*Grunts*
Go now!
They're getting away!
Your enemy is me!

messages.zh: ......交战的声音似乎平息下来了。
messages.en: ...The fighting seemed to have die down.

messages.zh: 但是抱歉，可萝尔，现在我们没有休息的时间，还得快走才行。
messages.en: But I'm sorry, Carol. We don't have time to rest right now. We have to go.

messages.zh: 没事......那个，鲍勃先生他，不知道怎么样了......！
messages.en: Alright... But what about Mr. Bob, we don't know... !

messages.zh: 可能，要给他一些时间吧。
messages.en: Maybe we should give him some time.
Give him some time... ? Are you saying we--
Ah!
Carol! are you alright?

messages.zh: 抱歉，被这个树根绊了一下......
messages.en: I'm sorry, I tripped over a tree root.
Here, take my hand.
... Thank you.
Can you walk?

messages.zh: ......没事的，只是擦伤。就像你说的，我们还是别停下脚步比较好......
messages.en: ..It's okay. It's just a scratch. Like you said, we better move...

messages.zh: 只要穿过森林就是莫拉蒂山的山脚下了，我们得进入半山腰第二个洞窟。
messages.en: Past the forest is the foot of mount Moratti. We will have to enter the second cave located halfway up the mountain.
Our only way is through that cave?

messages.zh: 是的，里面还有很多岔路和暗道，不过我知道该怎么走。宝藏就在洞窟的最深处。
messages.en: Yes, the cave has many branches and tunnels but I know the correct path. The treasure is at the deepest part of the cave.
Well. In that case...

messages.zh: 咦？好、好可怕的声音......远处有什么爆炸了吗......？
messages.en: Eh? W-what terrible sound... Was that an explosion in the distance... ?

messages.zh: 仔细听，还有呐喊和惨叫。
messages.en: Listen carefully, I hear shouts and screams.

messages.zh: 是战斗的声音。还没结束。
messages.en: It's the sound of battle. The battle is not over yet.
.... Carol, are you scared?
.... I’m afraid.

messages.zh: 但是，为了让我的村子平静下来，让我们的土地重归安宁......我也有一定要去做的事。
messages.en: But in order to calm my village and bring peace to our land... This is what I must do.
I see...
You are really strong.
Huh?

messages.zh: 没事。事不宜迟，我们继续前进吧。
messages.en: It’s nothing. Let's move on without further ado.
